Detailed Description

All software and hardware information about the Companion.

Those are class methods defined within ICISMPDevice

Function Documentation

+ (NSString*) firmwareRevision

The firmware revision of the device.

Returns
returns nil if the device is not connected, the firmware revision otherwise
+ (NSMutableArray *) getConnectedTerminals

Get the terminal's connected in Bluetooth.

Returns
NSMutableArray * containing the BT address of each connected Ingenico IAP device.
+ (NSString*) getWantedDevice

Return the device to work with.

Returns
returns nil if no device already selected with the setWantedDevice function
+ (NSString*) hardwareRevision

The hardware revision of the device.

Returns
returns nil if the device is not connected, the hardware revision otherwise
+ (NSString*) modelNumber

The model number of the device.

Returns
returns nil if the device is not connected, the model number otherwise
+ (NSString*) name

Bluetooth name of the device.

Returns
returns nil if the device is not connected, the name otherwise
+ (NSString*) serialNumber

The truncated serial number of the device.

Returns
returns nil if the device is not connected, the 8 last digits of the serial number otherwise. Use getFullSerialNumber for the full one.
+ (void) setWantedDevice: (NSString *)  wantedDevice

Set the device to work with.

Parameters
wantedDeviceThe device which you want to use
